title: 46th BCS viva voce schedule published
body: Bangladesh Public Service Commission published the date and schedule for the viva voce of 975 candidates who have provisionally passed the written examination of the 46th BCS. The detailed schedule has been published on the commissionâ€™s official website www.bpsc.gov.bd and on the Teletalk Bangladesh Limited portal http://bpsc.teletalk.com.bd, said a BPSC notification on Thursday. The commission reserves the right to bring any necessary amendments to the notification, it added.
